data.text: @auston @lapublichealth Yep.  Using flimsy masks to trap and contain a contagious virus.

@lapublichealth Still you get away with misinformation and sloppy data. Even if things get better LAPHD needs to get there director fired and investigated. We would have done a lot better with out your shoddy guidance. Still gets away with punishing those who are vaccinated/boosted.
@lapublichealth 2400 cases for a county of over 10 million and you still insist on children wearing masks 7 hours a day. Tell me again about following the data or science?

@lapublichealth Seriously people, if you don't want to wear a mask, just don't. Most places I've been lately aren't enforcing jack shit anymore. MASS NON-COMPLIANCE is the only way out at this point. Ferrer is a complete joke and won't let it go.

@slippy_maxwell @lapublichealth There's endless examples where places with mask mandates have done worse then places with no mask mandates. I'm convinced at this point that masks actually make things worse. Seriously.
@Skwidwurd2 @ReneeTupaz @lapublichealth Ok Tweaker. Go to bed SlapNuts. https://t.co/ovxviqgzms

@lapublichealth If you want to wear mask then wear mask. Only yourself knows what is good for your health. CDC, FDA they don’t pay your bills, raise you, or live with you. Stop following their agenda. Know your worth.

@anti_putin_bot @ScenarioRosey @wolfywolferton @lapublichealth @CDCgov @LACountyBOS No they won’t. Cause then that would be admitting that mask mandates did nothing. As we know the did nothing so yeah that won’t admit it

@RichieofPi1 @ScenarioRosey @wolfywolferton @lapublichealth @CDCgov @LACountyBOS So what happens when masks are gone, distancing is gone, events are full... and the trajectories all stay the same? Will anyone ever explain what we did all this for?
